text: The 1938 New Mexico gubernatorial election took place on November 8, 1938, in order to elect the Governor of New Mexico. Incumbent Democrat Clyde Tingley was term-limited, and could not run for reelection to a third consecutive term. ==General election== ===Results=== ==References== gubernatorial 1938 New Mexico Category:November 1938 events
title: 1938 New Mexico gubernatorial election
